nhc_headline: ...EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, DAMAGING  HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, AND FLASH FLOODING TO PORTIONS OF WESTERN  CUBA...
summary:
...EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, DAMAGING  HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, AND FLASH FLOODING TO PORTIONS OF WESTERN  CUBA...
 As of 1:00 PM EST Wed Nov 6
 the center of Rafael was located near 22.0, -82.3
 with movement NW at 14 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 956 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.
